tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: We’re thrilled that #FSI showed the largest increase across the entire federal government in @RPublicService’s annual surve…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: We’re thrilled that #FSI showed the largest increase across the entire federal government in @RPublicService’s annual survey of “Best Places to Work.” We moved up more than 200 spots in the rankings! So proud of the dedication of our Institute’s staff & instructors. #FEDBPTW
